price: Na mingapi katika miji iliyo kuwa ikidhulumu tumeiteketeza, na tukawasimamisha baada yao watu wengine.
arabic: وَكَمۡ قَصَمۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٖ كَانَتۡ ظَالِمَةٗ وَأَنشَأۡنَا بَعۡدَهَا قَوۡمًا ءَاخَرِينَ
footnotes: Na wengi katika watu wa miji tuliyo iteketeza kwa sababu ya ukafiri wao na kuwakadhibisha Manabii, na baada yao tukasimamisha kaumu nyengine zenye hali bora na mwisho mwema kuliko hao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wakam qaṣamnā min qaryatin kānat ẓālimatan wa-anshanā baʿdahā qawman ākharīna
